title: Tighten Option 0 (Air-Conditioning) Constraint
natural_language: Tighten the constraint on option 0 (representing air-conditioning) installation: at most one car requiring this option may appear within any sequence of four consecutive cars.
expected_change: Update constraint for Option 0 to have a window size of 4 and a maximum of 1 occurrence within that window.
evaluation_goal: Ensure that for Option 0 (air-conditioning), no 4-car window in the sequence contains more than one car requiring this option.
